languages.text: "Через несколько мгновений клапан твоего сердца разорвет судорога. Я мог бы заменить его, но... вытаскивать тебя из-за черты в третий раз будет совсем неинтересно. Прощай, образец".

"In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."
languages.original_text: "Через несколько мгновений клапан твоего сердца разорвет судорога. Я мог бы заменить его, но... вытаскивать тебя из-за черты в третий раз будет совсем неинтересно. Прощай, образец".

traits.locale_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simple be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

"In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

languages.text: 「後わずかで、お前の心臓はその痙攣によって引き裂かれてしまうだろう。それを取り替えてやることもできるが…死の際から引き戻すのも三度目ともなれば億劫だ。さらばだ、標本よ」
languages.original_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

traits.locale_text: 「後わずかで、お前の心臓はその痙攣によって引き裂かれてしまうだろう。それを取り替えてやることもできるが…死の際から引き戻すのも三度目ともなれば億劫だ。さらばだ、標本よ」

languages.text: “用不了多久，你的心脏瓣膜就会被痉挛撕成两半。我确实可以给你换个新的心脏瓣膜，不过这样的话……就是我第三次把你救回来了，这实在是太无聊了。永别了，实验对象。”
languages.original_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

traits.locale_text: “用不了多久，你的心脏瓣膜就会被痉挛撕成两半。我确实可以给你换个新的心脏瓣膜，不过这样的话……就是我第三次把你救回来了，这实在是太无聊了。永别了，实验对象。”

languages.text: « Dans quelques instants, les spasmes déchireront votre valvule cardiaque. Je pourrais la remplacer, mais... il serait vraiment trop fastidieux de vous ramener à la vie une troisième fois. Adieu, spécimen. »
languages.original_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

traits.locale_text: « Dans quelques instants, les spasmes déchireront votre valvule cardiaque. Je pourrais la remplacer, mais... il serait vraiment trop fastidieux de vous ramener à la vie une troisième fois. Adieu, spécimen. »

languages.text: «En cuestión de unos momentos, la válvula de tu corazón será desgarrada por los espasmos. Podría sustituirla, pero... sería muy aburrido traerte del otro lado por tercera vez. Adiós, espécimen».
languages.original_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

traits.locale_text: «En cuestión de unos momentos, la válvula de tu corazón será desgarrada por los espasmos. Podría sustituirla, pero... sería muy aburrido traerte del otro lado por tercera vez. Adiós, espécimen».

languages.text: "In wenigen Augenblicken wird Eure Herzklappe von Krämpfen zerfetzt werden. Ich könnte sie ersetzen, aber ... es wäre einfach zu ermüdend, Euch ein drittes Mal zurückzuholen. Lebt wohl, Versuchsstück."
languages.original_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

traits.locale_text: "In wenigen Augenblicken wird Eure Herzklappe von Krämpfen zerfetzt werden. Ich könnte sie ersetzen, aber ... es wäre einfach zu ermüdend, Euch ein drittes Mal zurückzuholen. "Lebt wohl, Versuchsstück."

languages.text: "Kalp kapakçığın birazdan kasılmalar nedeniyle parçalanacak. Onu yenisiyle değiştirebilirim ama... Seni eşiğin öteki tarafından üçüncü kez çekip çıkarmakla uğraşmak istemiyorum. Elveda numune."
languages.original_text: "In mere moments, your heart valve will be ripped apart by the spasms. I could replace it, but... it would simply be too tedious to drag you back from beyond the brink for the third time. Farewell, specimen."

traits.locale_text: "Kısa süre içinde kalp kapakçığın kasılmalar nedeniyle parçalanacak. Onu yenisiyle değiştirebilirim ama... Seni eşiği öteki tarafından üçüncü kez çekip çıkarmakla uğraşmak istemiyorum. Elveda numune."
